short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Crypto Wallet for the Internet Computer (ICP) blockchain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grind Wallet is a lightweight, fast, and elegant crypto wallet, available as a Chrome extension.

With Grind Wallet, you have access to ICP cryptocurrencies and a true web3 environment without unnecessary delays.

Our wallet is completely open source, which means full transparency and auditability by anyone.

You have full control over your private keys and assets - Grind Wallet does not store your funds with us, as they are safely stored on the blockchain, and you can access them at any time from another wallet supporting a compatible recovery phrase.

Lightning-fast transactions and optimized performance make it the best choice for every ICP user and blockchain enthusiast.

Our Chrome plugin is the perfect solution for anyone who wants to explore the decentralized internet from their browser. Join the ICP community and discover the true potential of Web3!
